paper_abstract: We extend the framework of Inductive Logic to Second Order languages and introduce Wilmers' Principle, a rational principle for probability functions on Second Order languages. We derive a representation theorem for functions satisfying this principle and investigate its relationship with the first order principles of Regularity and Super Regularity. (C) 2014 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Second order inductive logic and Wilmers' principle
